Reviews.Title: Great sign
Reviews.Author: S. J. Eggenberger
Reviews.Content: this is a good quality sign and is sturdy and will stand up to Michigan weather.  Will update review it we have any trouble with it after it is outside and weathered a while

ProductInfo.Features:
Our signs are made from outdoor durable plastic with professional grade vinyl graphics.
These signs will never rust or fade, perfect inside or out.
Make your home or business more secure and reduce your chances of being a victim.
